summary: Security update for Linux Kernel Live Patch 4 for SLE 12 SP2
details:
This update for the Linux Kernel fixes one security issue:

- CVE-2016-10088: The sg implementation in the Linux kernel did not properly restrict write operations in situations where the KERNEL_DS option is set, which allowed local users to read or write to arbitrary kernel memory locations or cause a denial of service (use-after-free) by leveraging access to a /dev/sg device (bsc#1017710).
